vsParam:
Bergamot Sensei, we want to know our scores for the last
assignment. Please tell us!

You are here. Wait over there.
I remember that the mark sheet was here...

Uh? Sensei.
Are those postcards displaying over there?

This is a scene of Olbius...
This is Ribrum, and this one says Ateria!

So amazing! There are so many beautiful sceneries of
Bressisle Island I've never seen!

I collected those during my journey before.
And I put up unused ones for decoration.

Journey? Bergamot Sensei went for
a journey before?

Yes. After graduation from the Academy,
I traveled around the world to widen my horizons.

Travelling around the world... It means,
you went to places outside Bressisle Island!

Yeah. I loved adventures back then.
My journey has gained me precious experience.

I got the headmaster's invitation during my journey,
and I decided to go back to the Academy and become a lecturer.

Wow... the headmaster invited you
to work here by himself...

I bet that's because Bergamot Sensei is an
outstanding alchemist, right?

[px], you must become an excellent alchemist
just like Sensei!

That's a firm answer.
I'll be waiting for you to put it into action.

Uh? B-Bergamot Sensei,
your face looks scary?
Ho ho, you are having an illusion.

That's a big talk. But young people
should have such an ambition.

However, I don't know if you can maintain your passion
after hearing your score in the assignment...

I'll comment on the last assignment.
Listen carefully.
